name: Rektic
author: Rektic

sections.description:
Rektic SEO plugin is an all-in-one blog content creation and management. We use Artificial Intelligence to give you everything you need to optimize your site for search engines and attract more traffic.

Our core promise is to help you write an article much faster and optimized for both SEO and
conversion.

Here are some features you may use:
* Generate meta tags, text structures, and content automatically
* Find the Most Relevant Keyword using our Suggestions
* SEO Analysis
* Competitors analysis
* Plagiarism detector
* And much more…

Using our plugin, you can significantly improve your SEO and achieve higher rankings in search results. This will help you attract more visitors to your site and generate more traffic.
So don’t hesitate any longer. Download our plugin today and boost your SEO!

Prime:
Rektic blog: Follow the latest SEO trends

License:
The rektic plugin is free to install and use.

You can sign up for one of our plans if you have significant content marketing and SEO needs.
